titleInfo.title: WSIX-TV Noel Ball at the Dixie Theaters

mods.abstract: One color window card (black on white) announcing the stars of WSIX-TV, Noel Ball and his TV Talent Search with Vernon way at the Dixie theater on September 16. Poster features metal photoplates of Noel Ball and Vernon Way.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
